law.catch_line: Peddling, Selling, Gaming, Horse Racing Or Exhibitions Near Grove
law.text: Whoever, not having his residence or regular place of business within one half mile of a grove licensed under section one hundred and eighty-eight, during the time of holding a picnic or other lawful gathering in such licensed grove and within one half mile thereof hawks or peddles goods, wares or merchandise, or establishes or maintains a tent, booth, vehicle or building for vending provisions or refreshments without the consent of the licensee of such grove, or engages in gaming or horse racing, or exhibits or offers to exhibit any show or play, shall forfeit not more than twenty dollars.
